title: What is exactly the same as it was 20 years ago? - Quora

response.answer_text: Sunny daysRainy daysGood laughsAnxietyMostly the world (people, places and things change, but the tone of life stays constant)SkittlesHow terrible everything on the news isPlayoff NHL is the best entertainment aroundRed Sox fans such as myself, even with 4 World Series Rings, are the most insufferable bunch of whiny, aggressive, and passionate baseball fans there areSubaru makes the best vehicles(along with most Japanese manufacturers)The burn-out rate for dreamers in life who get caught-up in our/everyone else’s B.S.Monday’s suckPeople using every forum possible to rant (exhibit A)American food is terrible for youTechnology available to the public is decades behind what is capableThe rich get richer, while the poor get poorerReffing in sports is rigged

A wise man I knew many years ago made the observation that the only thing that that remains constant is that everything changes therefore my answer to your question would have to be; just like 20 years ago, everything changes.
